actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the late Jack Benny.

summary.text: Directs and authorizes the Postmaster General to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the late Jack Benny in the denomination of 10 cents.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the late Jack Benny.
